result.title: runtime error c++ 1073741510
result.content:
please i need help , how can i solve runtime error http://codeforces.com/problemset/problem/339/B

include

include<stdio.h>

include<stdlib.h>

include <conio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() { unsigned n , m; unsigned i; cin >> n >> m; unsigned tab[n]; for (i=0; i<m ; i++) { cin >> tab[i]; } unsigned long long rest=0; i=1; unsigned j; unsigned last=1; for (j=0; j<m ; j++) { if (tab[j]>last) { rest=tab[j]-last+rest;

}
else if(tab[j]==last) {}
else
{
       rest=n-last+tab[j]+rest;
}
    last=tab[j];

} cout << rest << endl; return 0;

}
